name: Terms You Should Know as a UI/UX Designer (Free E-book)
description:
👋 Hey friends

I am excited to share the Free E-book I've been working on. I did it for a Terms You Should Know as a UI/UX Designer (Free E-book) by Karim Saif. I hope you'll enjoy it


Terms You Should Know as a UI/UX Designer (Free E-book)


To get it for free type in 0 before clicking "I want this!"

📬 What you'll find inside:

  • Some UI Terms
  • Some UX Terms
  • References


🤔 Who is this e-book for?

  • For Beginners who want to learn more about UI/UX design concepts to delve into them
  • Anyone who likes to look forward to the terms of design and aspire to learn


😢 Who is this eBook NOT for?

  • For intermediate and professional who know the concepts of UI / UX design well

But I want everyone who read it to teach me and learn together


Note: This book does not work with all the concepts, some of them because the concepts are endless


I am glad you read this book and read UX terms in Psychology You Should Know as a UI/UX Designer
